LPR.ModeSpecificDescription:
Click a position on the map to set were the pod spawns.


Press play to 
start!
LPR.ModePresetDescription:
Choose from one of the preset points on the left


Press play to 
start!
LPR.ModeInputTextDescription:
For more advanced users type your desired coords in manually


Press play to 
start!
LPR.ModeRandomDescription:
Press the button "Randomize Point" for a randompoint (can be in void so be carefull)

Press play to 
start!
LPR.OptionsDescription:
Modify experimental spawning properties or post-intro settings!

Press play to 
start!
